JARED ANDERS GILBERT

front-end developer and digital marketing strategist

bio

I am a self-taught front-end developer with over 3 years of professional experience in web development and digital marketing.

Working in 5 roles over the past 4 years, I've begun to forge a career driven by my passion for leveraging technology to solve problems in creative ways.

In my free time, I've been studying computer science while staying up to date on emerging technologies and design trends.

I'm looking to join an experienced yet progressive team at a fast-paced, ambitious company in a role that supports my growth as a developer.

If you're interested in getting to know me better and learning more about what I can do for you and your company, please send me a message.
